price: 21. Yalli isi ginók isih faxa marah addunyal aben urna taamáh akeeral digaalaah, isih faxa maray meqe taamá addunyal abiteh как nacruurah, kaadu qhiyaamah ayró kaá fanah gacsimtan.
arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yuʿadhibu man yashāu wayarḥamu man yashāu wa-ilayhi tuq'labūna
